Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Directs the veterans service commission to submit a report regarding coordinated services for veterans with service-connected disabilities
Summary: Directs the veterans service commission to submit a report regarding coordinated services for veterans with service-connected disabilities to the veterans' service director by April 1, 2024.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to directing the veterans service commission to submit a report relating to coordinated services for veterans with service-connected disabilities to the veterans' services director
